about_the_game:
For centuries, the land has groaned under the weight of oppression. The people, bound to servitude, are denied their rights while the wealthy thrive in luxury. But no longer. A spark of rebellion has ignited, and the time has come to overthrow the tyrants.

In this medieval tower-defense strategy game, you take command of the people's fight for justice. Balance resource management, strategic unit upgrades, and combat tactics as you climb through 150 levels of progression. Strengthen your forces by unlocking 30 unique attributes, from hardened attack units to fortified turrets, as you face off in 21 epic matches against a cunning and ruthless enemy.

Features:

  • Dynamic Difficulty Options: Tailor the challenge to your preferred playstyle with three difficulty levels.

  • Diverse Unit Roster: Deploy five unique attack units, each with specialized roles.

  • Tower Defense Meets RTS: Protect your tower while mining resources and launching attacks on the enemy’s stronghold.

  • Epic Boss Battles: Confront three formidable bosses that test your strategy and resolve.

  • Customization & Progression: Upgrade attributes and turrets to turn the tide of battle.

The stakes are high as you dismantle the kingdom’s oppressive power structure, piece by piece, culminating in an unforgettable assault on the Sword Spire. The future of the land depends on you. Will you lead the people to victory, or let tyranny endure?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.4 GHz / AMD Athlon 64 X2 2.6 GHz (or equivalent)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 / NVIDIA GeForce GT 520 / AMD Radeon HD 6470M
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 327 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Command a rebellion against an oppressive kingdom in this medieval tower-defense strategy game. Manage resources, upgrade units, and battle through 21 intense matches. Protect your tower, crush the enemy's, and lead the people to justice in a fight for freedom and equality.
